page.title: 19Fashion
page.content: Fashion is one of those things that is always changing.Our School Uniform is not very fashionable because Bottle Green has gone'out'.The most popular colours are Mint,Pink,Blue and other pastel colours.The least fashionable colours are Brown,Dark Green and Orange.Out of School girls like to wear trousers and flowery print tops and boys collarless (Grandad) shirts. Jeans are fashionable for boys and girls as are faded shirts. Most parents like their children to wear sensible shoes for school but we prefer to wear trainers.The best ones are those without laces-they have Velcro fastening. Girls like to wear slingback and stilleto heeled shoes. On the whole fashion changes from season to season each year.
